resources.string:
Compass Pro is a tool to search the magnetic north pole using your device's GeoMagnetic sensor and Accelerometer sensor.

 The app will work as good as your device's sensors are working.

 If you see "Calibrate your device", please hold and point your device up towards the sky and move it in a motion (like 8) as shown in the picture below.
Application Designed and Developed by\nSuvankar Mitra
